Method Detail

verifier

boolean verifier(MovaPublicKey pk,
                 Message m,
                 MovaSignature s)
This method runs the verifier side of the interactive protocol

Parameters:
pk - Public key
m - Message that was signed
s - Signature of the message
Returns:
Returns true if the protocol ran correctly, false otherwise.

boolean prover(MovaPublicKey pk,
               MovaSecretKey sk,
               Message m,
               MovaSignature s)
This method runs the prover side of the interactive protocol

Parameters:
pk - Public key
sk - Secret key
m - message that was signed
s - signature of the message
Returns:
Returns true the protocol runs correctly, false otherwise.
